QuestData.Title: The Darkscale Warlord
QuestData.Description: If the naga want to throw in their lot with the Twilight's Hammer, then may Elune have mercy on them.$B$BGo into their lair in the island of Nazj'vel and find their leader, the naga warlord known only as Wrathspine.$B$BPerhaps the horn of the ancients can still be saved.
QuestData.RewardText: The warlord doesn't seem to have the horn on him. Perhaps he was telling the truth.
